textBox.richText: Yesterday was the Gaithersburg Book Festival. I was really pleased to get a spot again this year since it went so well for me last year. Even with the horrid weather and an infant in tow, it was a good time. I met some very nice people and got a few questions that really challenged me. I also have to thank my mother-in-law (back there with Sheffield) for helping out yesterday, and my husband (taking the selfie) for his awesome sales work. Though the tactic of yelling “Time Travel” at people walking by seemed to startle them more than get them to stop at the table. On the right there is the concept of the cover for book number 3 in The Sphere Saga, tentatively titled “The Lunar Conspiracy”. Since so many people purchased copies of my books yesterday, I’m going to extend the character name contest out a few more months. So if you read one of my books and write a review before September, let me know!
